pageHeader.subtitle: Development of various websites for Napa based wineries.
pageHeader.description: > I built a number of websites for the niche market that is Napa wineries. Napa is a very close community, and several companies focus almost entirely on producing websites for the wineries.  For these projects, I translated Photoshop designs supplied by these firms into HTML, CSS, and Flash.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
